Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps track of simulation time and selects eligible agents so that they can act during their alloted time.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Agent> agentList
      List of all agents in the simulator
      private long time
      Simulator time in milliseconds.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Controller()
      Creates a controller with no agents.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activateAgent(Agent a)
      Enable the agent to act until it no longer needs to act.
      int createAgents(int num)
      Create all the agents.
      void selectActingAgent()
      Select eligible agents randomly to act.
